ngiemboon: Apùʼ ssé na nò yɔɔn ńgwɔ́ kɔ́?
en: What is the beginning of this affair?

ngiemboon: À cǔa wɔ́ɔn. Púʼu, mèŋ nge gʉa.
en: He hit me. So, I'm going to leave.

ngiemboon: Nkʉ̀ gẅie ɔ̀ tsẅii, ée púʼu.
en: This information you give is correct.

ngiemboon: N tǒ mbʉ̀a gù, ɔ̀ cúa wɔ́ɔn. Púʼu la, n cʉʼʉ́ tóo wó wɔ́.
en: I came to your house, you hit me. So I won't come anymore.
sound of water coming out of a skinny calabash

ngiemboon: Ntse ne ńkẅɛɛ tsɛ̀ɛ tÿóon lê pʉ̌ŋ pʉ̌ŋ pʉ̌ŋ.
en: The water is coming out into the calabash that “pʉ̌ŋ pʉ̌ŋ pʉ̌ŋ”.
